data.title: Las Lomitas, Argentina

data.text:
Weather forecast and temperature for today - Tuesday, 27. Aug

07:18

18:49

-03

Cloudy

23°C / 8°C

Wind: 13km/h ESE

Humidity: 45%

Precip. probability: 1%

Precipitation: 0mm

UV index: 6

On Tuesday, in Las Lomitas, the sky will be clouded.

Considerable temperature fluctuations from a high of a warm 23°C (73.4°F) to a low of a chilly 8°C (46.4°F) are anticipated.

It will be colder, and the maximum temperature will be more in line with July's average highest temperature of 22.3°C (72.1°F) than August's of 26.5°C (79.7°F).

Sunrise will be at 07:18 and sunset at 18:49; the daylight will last for 11h and 31min.

Current condition and temperature - Las Lomitas, Argentina

Currently, the sky is moderately clouded.

The temperature is a fresh 11°C (51.8°F), while the feels-like temperature is a similar 10°C (50°F). The current temperature is far from the maximum of 23°C (73.4°F) anticipated for today.

Frequently asked questions

What is the current temperature?

At 00:10, the temperature is 11°C (51.8°F).

What is the weather forecast for Las Lomitas for today?

On Tuesday, in Las Lomitas, cloudy weather is expected.

What will be the highest temperature today?

Today, the maximum temperature in Las Lomitas will be 23°C (73.4°F), while the minimum temperature will be 8°C (46.4°F).

The maximum temperature will be a couple of degrees lower than the average highest temperature of 26.5°C (79.7°F) in August. The lowest temperature will be significantly lower than the average low of 14.2°C (57.6°F).

When is the sunrise / sunset today?

On Tuesday, in Las Lomitas, sunrise will be at 07:18 and sunset at 18:49 (-03).

How long is the day today?

In Las Lomitas, today, there will be 11h and 31min of daylight.
